long_description: Armed with 2 layers of performance-enhancing titanal, the Nordica Elcapo skis combine easy-to-turn rockered tips and tails with a chatter-reducing design to take on any terrain on the mountain. Full wood core with 2 layers of titanal offers aggressive experts maximum power transmission, torsion resistance, and rebound in all conditions. Nordica Elcapo skis feature rockered tips that make it easy to initiate turns in any condition and increase flotation and maneuvarability in soft snow. Standard camber underfoot enhances grip on groomers and variable snow. 107mm waists offer good flotation in soft powder and help you blast through crud and crusty snow. Large sidecut radius is designed to excel when heading off-piste. 107mm waists require bindings with wide brakes. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Armed with 2 layers of performance-enhancing titanal, the Nordica Elcapo skis combine easy-to-turn rockered tips and tails with a chatter-reducing design to take on any terrain on the mountain.
